text: Saint David is one of Dominica's ten administrative parishes. It is on the eastern side of the island. ==Settlements== Its largest settlement is Castle Bruce.Commonwealth of Dominica, Population and Housing Census – 2001. Roseau, Dominica: Central Statistical Office, Ministry of Finance and Planning, Kennedy Avenue, 2001. Other villages include: *Grand Fond *Rosalie *Good Hope *Petit Soufrière *Riviere Cyrique *Morne Jaune *San Sauveur *Carib Territory *Atkinson *Antrizle ==References== Category:Parishes of Dominica
title: Saint David Parish, Dominica
